DOC.brief_summary: This prospective, observational, multicenter study will assess the efficacy and safety of RoActemra/Actemra (tocilizumab) on the use of glucocorticoids in patients with moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis and an inadequate response to previous disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs or anti-TNF. Data will be collected for 36 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of RoActemra/Actemra (Tocilizumab) in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Treated With Glucocorticoids
DOC.criteria: Adults patients, over 18 years of age Patients with moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis (RA) Patients on a stable dose of prednisone or equivalent (>/=7.5 mg/day) for at least 4 weeks before study inclusion Patients previously treated with RoActemra/Actemra Any contraindication to RoActemra/Actemra
